text: Simon Loxley is a British graphic designer and bestselling author. == Life == He was born and raised in London. == Career == He has worked for the National Portrait Gallery, Museum of London, the Geffrye Museum, the Maritime Museum, the London Library, and the Dulwich Picture Gallery. He is a founding editor of Ultrabold magazine. == Bibliography == Some of his books are: * Type: The Secret History of Letters * Type is Beautiful: The Story of Fifty Remarkable Fonts * Printer's Devil: The Life and Work of Frederic Warde * La historia secreta de las letras * Believe Me, I Am: Selected Letters of Frederic Warde == References == ==External links== * Category:British writers Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
